016package org.talend.sdk.component.api.service.cache;
017
018import java.util.function.Supplier;
019
020/**
021 * Framework service injectable in components or services methods
022 * to handle local caching.
023 * Useful for actions when deployed in a long running instance
024 * when actions are costly.
025 */
026public interface LocalCache {
027
028    /**
029     * Remove a cached entry.
030     *
031     * @param key key to evict.
032     */
033    void evict(String key);
034
035    /**
036     * Remove a cached entry if a particular value is in the cache.
037     *
038     * @param key key to evict.
039     * @param expected expected value activating the eviction.
040     */
041    <T> void evictIfValue(String key, T expected);
042
043    /**
044     * Read or compute and save a value for a determined duration.
045     *
046     * @param key the cache key, must be unique accross the server.
047     * @param timeoutMs the cache duration.
048     * @param supplier the value provider if the cache get does a miss.
049     * @param <T> the type of data to access/cache.
050     * @return the cached or newly computed value.
051     */
052    <T> T computeIfAbsent(String key, long timeoutMs, Supplier<T> supplier);
053
054    /**
055     * Default the timeout to {@literal Integer.MAX_VALUE}.
056     *
057     * @param key the cache key, must be unique accross the server.
058     * @param supplier the value provider if the cache get does a miss.
059     * @param <T> the type of data to access/cache.
060     * @return the cached or newly computed - and cached indefinitively - value.
061     */
062    default <T> T computeIfAbsent(String key, Supplier<T> supplier) {
063        return computeIfAbsent(key, Integer.MAX_VALUE, supplier);
064    }
065}
